Name: App Logic Vulnerability Prevention
Description__c: Find and fix clickjacking, open redirects, cross-site request forgery, and other vulnerabilities.

Name: Application Security Basics
Description__c: Learn about application security and the job of an application security engineer.

Name: Build a Connected App
Description__c: Create and manage a connected app that gives users secure API access to your org.

Name: Connected App Basics
Description__c: Learn how connected apps integrate external applications with Salesforce.

Name: Cybersecurity Risk Management
Description__c: Discover what it means to build cybersecurity risk management in an organization.

Name: Cybersecurity Risk Manager Responsibilities
Description__c: Explore a cybersecurity risk manager's role in identifying, managing, and detecting risks.

Name: Cybersecurity Threat Prevention and Response
Description__c: Learn how to prevent, respond to, and recover from cyber attacks.

Name: Data Leak Prevention
Description__c: Learn coding best practices to safeguard your Salesforce data.

Name: Data Security
Description__c: Control access to data using point-and-click security tools.

Name: Digital Security Basics
Description__c: Learn digital security terms and identify types of digital criminals and threats.

Name: European Union Privacy Law Basics
Description__c: Learn about the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and how to comply.

Name: Identity Basics
Description__c: Secure your org so users can log in once to access a variety of apps, orgs, and services.

Name: Injection Vulnerability Prevention
Description__c: Find and fix cross-site scripting, SOQL injection, and other vulnerabilities.

Name: Network Security Basics
Description__c: Learn methods and strategies to prevent network attacks.

Name: Protect Your Data in Salesforce
Description__c: Secure your Salesforce org by controlling login and data access for users.

Name: Secure Secret Storage
Description__c: Learn how to protect application secrets in your Salesforce org.

Name: Security Awareness and Training
Description__c: Learn what it means to build security awareness into an organization.

Name: Security for Lightning ComponentsSecurity for Lightning Components
Description__c: Learn about the security architecture for Lightning and how to protect your components.

Name: Security Specialist
Description__c: Flex your security muscles by locking down permissions and tracking changes.

Name: Session-Based Permission Sets and Security
Description__c: Use session-based permission sets to limit access to data in your org.

Name: Sharing & Visibility Designer Certification
Description__c: The Salesforce Certified Sharing and Visibility Specialist is designed for architects, analysts, and administrators who want to demonstrate their knowledge, skills, and capabilities to design secure, scalable security models on the Force.com platform.

Name: US Privacy Law Basics
Description__c: Learn about US privacy laws and how to comply.

Name: User Management
Description__c: Set up users and control how they can view or edit your business data.
